name: Smack-a-toad
description:
We are a group of aspiring game artists and software engineers from New Zealand. We have a passion for creating games and interactive worlds, and are on a journey in learning the skills of the industry.

We are all studying at Media Design School, New Zealand.

Artists:

Ben Aitkenhead: Artstation |  Instagram
Stuart Whittaker: Artstation | Instagram
